text: @realDonaldTrump President Trump wants to preserve Heritage,History and Greatness of our country. "Heritage" is euphemism for white ancestry. "History" means history of Bragg, Benning, Hood, Lee and other Confederate traitors. "Greatness"  means 2,628,091 confirmed COVID-19 cases, 127,286 deaths.
